name: Flatnet
description:
"Some planets are flat, after all."
NKA-4

NKA-4, a spaceship control core, needs to find the other components so it can rebuild the ship and return to space.

Fortunately, it is equipped with a powerful drill.

Fear it, Flatnet.

Game submitted to Ludum Dare 38: "A Small World"

CONTROLS

WASD/Arrows to move

Space to drill through ground.

Mouse to slightly adjust the camera

Made with Game Maker Studio 2

Ingame font: "m3x6" by managore
Sprite software: Aseprite
Music software: Tuxguitar
